describe: simple state machine with a single pass state and an inputPath of null value

tests.describe: should output '{}' with the input set as '{}' and the inputPath set a null
should output '{}' with the input set as '[]' and the inputPath set a null
should output '{}' with the input set as '{"tea": "test"}' and the inputPath set a null
should output '{}' with the input set as '[1,2]' and the inputPath set a null

definition.Comment: A Hello World example of the Amazon States Language using a Pass state
